insert into `cms_page_translations` (`locale`, `page_title`, `html_content`, `meta_title`, `url_key`, `meta_keywords`, `meta_description`, `cms_page_id`) values ('en', 'Become a Vendor', '
  • Home
  • Become a Vendor

Millions Of Shoppers Can’t Wait To See What You Have In Store

Start Selling

WHY SELL ON MARTFURY

Join a marketplace where nearly 50 million buyers around
the world shop for unique items

Low Fees

It doesn’t take much to list your items and once you make a sale, Martfury’s transaction fee is just 2.5%.

Learn more

Powerful Tools

Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business.

Learn more

Support 24/7

Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business.

Learn more

How it works

Easy to start selling online on Martfury just 4 simple steps

Register and list your products

  • Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
  • Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online
1

Receive orders and sell your product

  • Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
  • Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online
2

Package and ship with ease

  • Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
  • Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online
3

Package and ship with ease

  • Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
  • Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online
4

BEST FEES TO START

Affordable, transparent, and secure

It doesn’t cost a thing to list up to 50 items a month, and you only pay after your stuff sells. It’s just a small percent of the money you earn

Listing fees are billed for 0.20 USD, so if your bank’s currency is not USD, the amount in your currency may vary based on changes in the exchange rate.

  "html_content" => """
    <div class="ps-page--single">\r\n
    <div class="ps-breadcrumb">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <ul class="breadcrumb">\r\n
    <li><a href="http://localhost:8000/">Home</a></li>\r\n
    <li>Become a Vendor</li>\r\n
    </ul>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-vendor-banner bg--cover" style="background-image: url('http://localhost:8000/static/img/bg/vendor.jpg');">\r\n
    <div class="ps-vendor-banner">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <h2>Millions Of Shoppers Can’t Wait To See What You Have In Store</h2>\r\n
    <a class="ps-btn ps-btn--lg" href="#">Start Selling</a></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section--vendor ps-vendor-about">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__header">\r\n
    <p>WHY SELL ON MARTFURY</p>\r\n
    <h4>Join a marketplace where nearly 50 million buyers around <br /> the world shop for unique items</h4>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__content">\r\n
    <div class="row">\r\n
    <div class="col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-12 ">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--icon-box-2">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__thumbnail"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/icons/vendor-1.png" alt="martfury" /></div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__content">\r\n
    <h4>Low Fees</h4>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__desc" data-mh="about-desc">\r\n
    <p>It doesn’t take much to list your items and once you make a sale, Martfury’s transaction fee is just 2.5%.</p>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <a href="#">Learn more</a></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-12 ">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--icon-box-2">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__thumbnail"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/icons/vendor-2.png" alt="martfury" /></div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__content">\r\n
    <h4>Powerful Tools</h4>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__desc" data-mh="about-desc">\r\n
    <p>Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business.</p>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <a href="#">Learn more</a></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-12 ">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--icon-box-2">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__thumbnail"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/icons/vendor-3.png" alt="martfury" /></div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__content">\r\n
    <h4>Support 24/7</h4>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__desc" data-mh="about-desc">\r\n
    <p>Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business.</p>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <a href="#">Learn more</a></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section--vendor ps-vendor-milestone">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__header">\r\n
    <p>How it works</p>\r\n
    <h4>Easy to start selling online on Martfury just 4 simple steps</h4>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__content">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--vendor-milestone">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__left">\r\n
    <h4>Register and list your products</h4>\r\n
    <ul>\r\n
    <li>Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business</li>\r\n
    <li>Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online</li>\r\n
    </ul>\r\n
    </div>\r\n

    <div class="ps-block__number"><span>1</span></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--vendor-milestone reverse">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__left">\r\n
    <h4>Receive orders and sell your product</h4>\r\n
    <ul>\r\n
    <li>Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business</li>\r\n
    <li>Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online</li>\r\n
    </ul>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__right"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/vendor/milestone-2.png" alt="martfury" /></div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__number"><span>2</span></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--vendor-milestone">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__left">\r\n
    <h4>Package and ship with ease</h4>\r\n
    <ul>\r\n
    <li>Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business</li>\r\n
    <li>Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online</li>\r\n
    </ul>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__right"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/vendor/milestone-3.png" alt="martfury" /></div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__number"><span>3</span></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block--vendor-milestone reverse">\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__left">\r\n
    <h4>Package and ship with ease</h4>\r\n
    <ul>\r\n
    <li>Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business</li>\r\n
    <li>Our Martfury Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online</li>\r\n
    </ul>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__right"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/vendor/milestone-4.png" alt="martfury" /></div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-block__number"><span>4</span></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section--vendor ps-vendor-best-fees">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__header">\r\n
    <p>BEST FEES TO START</p>\r\n
    <h4>Affordable, transparent, and secure</h4>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__content">\r\n
    <h5>It doesn’t cost a thing to list up to 50 items a month, and you only pay after your stuff sells. It’s just a small percent of the money you earn</h5>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__numbers">\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <h3>$0</h3>\r\n
    <span>List Fee</span></figure>\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <h3>5%</h3>\r\n
    <span>Final Value Fee</span></figure>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__desc">\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <figcaption>Here's what you get for your fee:</figcaption>\r\n
    <ul>\r\n
    <li>A worldwide community of more than 160 million shoppers.</li>\r\n
    <li>Shipping labels you can print at home, with big discounts on postage.</li>\r\n
    <li>Seller protection and customer support to help you sell your stuff.</li>\r\n
    </ul>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__highlight"><img src="http://localhost:8000/static/img/icons/vendor-4.png" alt="martfury" />\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <p>We process payments with PayPal, an external payments platform that allows you to process transactions with a variety of payment methods. Funds from PayPal sales on Martfury will be deposited into your PayPal account.</p>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__footer">\r\n
    <p>Listing fees are billed for 0.20 USD, so if your bank’s currency is not USD, the amount in your currency may vary based on changes in the exchange rate.</p>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-client-say">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__header">\r\n

    <p>Sed elit quam, iaculis sed semper sit amet udin vitae nibh. at magna akal semperFusce commodo molestie luctus.Lorem ipsum Dolor tusima olatiup.</p>\r\n

    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section--vendor ps-vendor-faqs">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__header">\r\n
    <p>FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS</p>\r\n
    <h4>Here are some common questions about selling on Martfury</h4>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__content">\r\n
    <div class="row">\r\n
    <div class="col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-12 ">\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <figcaption>How do fees work on Martfury?</figcaption>\r\n
    <p>Joining and starting a shop on Martfury is free. There are three basic selling fees: a listing fee, a transaction fee, and a payment processing fee.</p>\r\n
    <p>It costs USD 0.20 to publish a listing to the marketplace. A listing lasts for four months or until the item is sold. Once an item sells, there is a 3.5% transaction fee on the sale price (not including shipping costs). If you accept payments with PayPal, there is also a payment processing fee based on their fee structure.</p>\r\n
    <p>Listing fees are billed for $0.20 USD, so if your bank’s currency is not USD, the amount may differ based on changes in the exchange rate.</p>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <figcaption>What do I need to do to create a shop?</figcaption>\r\n
    <p>It’s easy to set up a shop on Martfury. Create an Martfury account (if you don’t already have one), set your shop location and currency, choose a shop name, create a listing, set a payment method (how you want to be paid), and finally set a billing method (how you want to pay your Martfuryfees).</p>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-12 col-12 ">\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <figcaption>How do I get paid?</figcaption>\r\n
    <p>If you accept payments with PayPal, funds from PayPal sales on Martfury will be deposited into your PayPal account. We encourage sellers to use a PayPal Business account and not a Personal account, as personal accounts are subject to monthly receiving limits and cannot accept payments from buyers that are funded by a credit card.</p>\r\n
    <p>It costs USD 0.20 to publish a listing to the marketplace. A listing lasts for four months or until the item is sold. Once an item sells, there is a 3.5% transaction fee on the sale price (not including shipping costs). If you accept payments with PayPal, there is also a payment processing fee based on their fee structure.</p>\r\n
    <p>Listing fees are billed for $0.20 USD, so if your bank’s currency is not USD, the amount may differ based on changes in the exchange rate.</p>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <figcaption>Do I need a credit or debit card to create a shop?</figcaption>\r\n
    <p>No, a credit or debit card is not required to create a shop. To be verified as a seller you have the choice to use either a credit card or to register via PayPal. You will not incur any charges until you open your shop and publish your listings.</p>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    <figure>\r\n
    <figcaption>What can I sell on Martfury?</figcaption>\r\n
    </figure>\r\n
    <p>Martfury provides a marketplace for crafters, artists and collectors to sell their handmade creations, vintage goods (at least 20 years old), and both handmade and non-handmade crafting supplies.</p>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-section__footer">\r\n
    <p>Still have more questions? Feel free to contact us.</p>\r\n
    <a class="ps-btn" href="#">Contact Us</a></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    <div class="ps-vendor-banner bg--cover" style="background-image: url('http://localhost:8000/static/img/bg/vendor.jpg');">\r\n
    <div class="ps-vendor-banner">\r\n
    <div class="container">\r\n
    <h2>Millions Of Shoppers Can’t Wait To See What You Have In Store</h2>\r\n
    <a class="ps-btn ps-btn--lg" href="#">Start Selling</a></div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>\r\n
    </div>
    """

  "url_key" => "become-a-vendor"
  "meta_keywords" => ""
  "meta_description" => ""
]
